sentence.Network_en: Dengue, filariasis, leishmaniasis , onchocerciasis, and American trypanosomiasis ( Chagas disease ) are other diseases carried by insects.
sentence.Network_cn: 登革热病 、 丝虫病 、 黑热病 、 盘尾丝虫病及美洲锥虫病 ( 查格斯病 ) 也是由昆虫传播的疾病.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from modern Latin Onchocerca (from Greek onkos 'barb' + kerkos 'tail') + -iasis

means.word_mean: 1. infestation with slender threadlike roundworms (filaria) deposited under the skin by the bite of black fleas; when the eyes are involved it can result in blindness; common in Africa and tropical America

auth_sentence.content: Two of them, trachoma and onchocerciasis, lead to blindness if not treated.
